ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons Dairygold', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '300g sliced mushrooms (whichever variety you like)', '1 tablespoon chopped thyme leaves or dried thyme', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '1 ciabatta loaf, divided into four and toasted']
